name: Furious Combat
description:
Furious Combat

It is Unlimited Action Game

Furious Combat is the perfect balance of strategy, fast-paced action and easy to play Game.
This is a modern war! Want to be an action hero? Take all-important Kill Shot!

Control the action and test your skills against the fearsome special enemies on the battlefield!

If you love combat games, take hold of combat arms to counter strike the invading enemy. Play as brave soldier in this sniper shooter assassin.

Enemies have brought the modern weapon to destroy everything with a push of a button.
It is a first person shooter where you will fight in sniper and rifle stages, all in a highly detailed futuristic environment where you will feel the pressure of being the first line in the batllefield.
Kill your enemies in the conflict and fight for the glory of the Empire, Take your rifle and kill them all. impingement is everything now.

Lead the anti-terrorist counter attack and aspire to become the bravo cadet in the best sniper strike game.
Use the modern weapons like rifle, war machine gun, ak47 & mp4 guns. Be disparate as steady furious killer and carried out elite counter bowman 3D.
Be prepared for the terrorist counter attack; grab your ak47 & mp4 from your wide ammo collection at military arsenal.
Use SWAT target shooting skills to become the best bowman of the modern elite force with the last sniper simulator.

How to Play:

* Just touch the screen with your finger or thumb to kill the enemies
* Make sure you do not miss the shots and respond quickly

This is the best shooter game you will ever play.

Key Features

- Different weapons, customizable and upgradeable
- Realistic shooting of your weapon
- Realistic environment
- Thrilling First Person Shooting Game
- Multiple modern weapons
